response.overview: In 2005 a 12 year old girl was kidnapped and kept hostage by serial rapist Johnannes "Hansie" Mowers in a secret man-made bunker. She was forced to live in this tiny shelter as his 'wife' and take care of his two year old biological daughter. They eventually were forced to survive on sugar water, and even snails.
response.title: Whispers in the Dark
